column1: Applied Transfusion and Transplantation Science - MSc
column2: University of the West of England, Bristol
column5: Transfusion and transplantation services save lives. They provide vital blood, stem cell and organ donations for patients with serious illnesses, alongside specialist testing for hospital patients. Due to a national shortage in these services, transfusion and transplant specialists are in high demand. This MSc in Applied Transfusion and Transplantation Science aims to tackle this shortage.Why UWE
column7: Home Award Fee £9750 Home Module Fee (15 Credit) £813  Home Module Fee (15 Credit) £813 Offshore Module Fee (15 Credit) £1229
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
